name: Ca$h Cra$h
description:
Ca$h Cra$h is a fun, simple game where you play as a college student obtaining money to pay off your student debt. The way to obtain money in this game is by getting hit by cars that hold varying amounts of money while also trying to stay alive. 

Instructions:

  • Use WASD or the arrow keys to control your character
  • Cars will indicate their amount of money by $, $$, or $$$ 
    • the more money a car gives, the more health it deducts from the player
  • Ambulances will give you health to help stay alive
  • Don't let the construction zones catch up to you or you. will. DIE.
  • There are 3 types of power-ups that the player can collect as they go
    • more details can be found in the tutorial page based in the menu
